channel.title: [317] Project X [317] Client Coders needed!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://clip2net.com/clip/m46768/1275329292-29345-67kb.png?nocache=1[/img][/center] [center] [u][b]Currently Working on the Server[/b][/u][/center] [center]-- Infinity Zr (me) --[/center] [center][u][b]What is Project X?[/b][/u][/center] [center]Project X is a server for people to have fun on there will be no Buying/selling Staff spots! This will be based of Delta/Chosen pkz[/center] [center][u][b]Why this server[/b][/u][/center] [center]Becuase it is a delta/chosen pkz source i am able to learn more from it instead of shooting to Hyperon/Riotscape sources i want to take my time through a delta source before going onto the more cleaned and stable sources![/center] [center][u][b]Forums/Host[/b][/u][/center] [center]The forums will be a SMF dont want to get Nulled vbulletin! The host will be on my Pc a Dual core Processer with 1gb of ram and 250gb of HDD i am hoping this will hold 50+ players[/center] [center][u][b]Client/Server coders[/b][/u][/center] [center]Yes i will need client coders but not at the very moment atm i know alot about Clients so i think i will be able to manage i will let you know if i need Server/Client coders but atm i dont need any![/center] [center][u][b]What are you trying to Accomplish[/b][/u][/center] [center]Nothing i just want to get players and a great community.[/center] [center][u][b]Customs Items[/b][/u][/center] [center]There will be customs like GodSwords/D claws but there will be nothing like Crappy Recoloured of stupid swords ect..[/center] [center][u][b]Minigames[/b][/u][/center] [center]There will be 90% pest control i am working on atm (Not sure if im going to add the npcs) Barrows 50% stupid methods.! Fighting caves 70% there needs to be a reward and a correct timer! assault minigame keeping the same CBA with that Tbh its 100% UGLY![/center] [center][u][b]Combat/skills[/b][/u][/center] [center]Attack 10% redoing the hole System will post a pic later strenght 100% Magic 100% Mage done Range 100% Range Done Hp 100% Defence 100% Prayer 85% Need the new prayer interface Non Combat skills WoodCutting 100% you now need the certain axes to WC Firemaking 100% works fine to me Herblore 50% Shitty delta base Farming 50% shitty delta base Aglity 70% not a very good base thieving 90% adding more npcs to the thieving base RuneCraft 100% going to leave it and maybe update in the future Crafting 88% just need to add some more junk instead of crafting amulets Fletching 100% works fine (delta base 100% credits to him) Slayer 80% adding some more areas Mining/Smithing 90% interfaces are not added. Fishing/cooking 90% adding more places to fish and Adding a method to cook on a fire (Maybe add a certain level to cook fish on logs.)[/center] [center][u]To join fill in this APP[/u][/center] [center][size=14pt][u][b] The Team[/b][/u][/size][/center] [center][u][b]Web Devolopment[/b][/u] --x_Tonis121_x-- [u][b]Client coders [/b][/u] --------[/center]
[center]Why do you want to join? Age? What spot? (Client coders are only open for now) experience in java? will you give your msn to me?[/center]
[center][u][b]Client Update log [/b][/u][/center] [center]Nothing has been added![/center] [center][u][b][size=14pt]Update log[/size][/b][/u][/center] [center]31/05/2010 - Equipment Tab added it will now open and close.[/center] [center]31/05/2010 - Some stupid Teleport GFX has been remove back to the Normal simple teleport.[/center] [center]1/05/2010 - Range following and mage following + Combat following has been added (Looks buggy becuase of the 525 Anim of running)[/center] [center][u][b][size=14pt]Picture/videos[/size][/b][/u][/center] [center][img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/3306/walking.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/3122/stancel.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/7728/ranging.jpg[/img][/center] [center][img]http://img218.imageshack.us/img218/7186/73365705.jpg[/img][/center] [center][size=14pt]Credits Delta Chosen pk[/size][/center] [center] [size=14pt] [u][b]*Warning*[/b][/u][/size] [size=12pt]I know people are not very happy on the delta base i dont mind Ideas being posted but no Flaming please you dont see me going to your thread and Flaming at you.! No bad comments dont like dont comment just leave the thread![/size][/center]

Age? 16
What spot? (Client coders are only open for now) website desginer(i know you only are accepting client coders, but i work for SMF)
Experience in java? 1/2 a year.
Will you give your msn to me? Yes: xtonis121x@live.com

item.title: [317] Project X [317] Client Coders needed!
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]
Currently Working on the Server[/center]
[center]-- Infinity Zr (me) --[/center]

[center]What is Project X?[/center]
[center]Project X is a server for people to have fun on there will be no Buying/selling Staff spots! This will be based of Delta/Chosen pkz[/center]

[center]Why this server[/center]
[center]Becuase it is a delta/chosen pkz source i am able to learn more from it instead of shooting to Hyperon/Riotscape sources i want to take my time through a delta source before going onto the more cleaned and stable sources![/center]

[center]Forums/Host[/center]
[center]The forums will be a SMF dont want to get Nulled vbulletin! The host will be on my Pc a Dual core Processer with 1gb of ram and 250gb of HDD i am hoping this will hold 50+ players[/center]

[center]Client/Server coders[/center]
[center]Yes i will need client coders but not at the very moment atm i know alot about Clients so i think i will be able to manage i will let you know if i need Server/Client coders but atm i dont need any![/center]

[center]What are you trying to Accomplish[/center]
[center]Nothing i just want to get players and a great community.[/center]

[center]Customs Items[/center]
[center]There will be customs like GodSwords/D claws but there will be nothing like Crappy Recoloured of stupid swords ect…[/center]

[center]Minigames[/center]
[center]There will be 90% pest control i am working on atm (Not sure if im going to add the npcs)
Barrows 50% stupid methods.!
Fighting caves 70% there needs to be a reward and a correct timer!
assault minigame keeping the same CBA with that Tbh its 100% UGLY![/center]

[center]Combat/skills[/center]
[center]Attack 10% redoing the hole System will post a pic later
strenght 100%
Magic 100% Mage done
Range 100% Range Done
Hp 100%
Defence 100%
Prayer 85% Need the new prayer interface

Non Combat skills
WoodCutting 100% you now need the certain axes to WC
Firemaking 100% works fine to me
Herblore 50% Shitty delta base
Farming 50% shitty delta base
Aglity 70% not a very good base
thieving 90% adding more npcs to the thieving base
RuneCraft 100% going to leave it and maybe update in the future
Crafting 88% just need to add some more junk instead of crafting amulets
Fletching 100% works fine (delta base 100% credits to him)
Slayer 80% adding some more areas
Mining/Smithing 90% interfaces are not added.
Fishing/cooking 90% adding more places to fish and Adding a method to cook on a fire (Maybe add a certain level to cook fish on logs.)[/center]

[center]To join fill in this APP[/center]
[center][size=14pt]
The Team[/size][/center]
[center]Web Devolopment
–x_Tonis121_x–
Client coders

--------[/center]

[center]Why do you want to join? Age? What spot? (Client coders are only open for now) experience in java? will you give your msn to me?[/center]

[center]Client Update log
[/center]
[center]Nothing has been added![/center]

[center][size=14pt]Update log[/size][/center]
[center]31/05/2010 - Equipment Tab added it will now open and close.[/center]
[center]31/05/2010 - Some stupid Teleport GFX has been remove back to the Normal simple teleport.[/center]
[center]1/05/2010 - Range following and mage following + Combat following has been added (Looks buggy becuase of the 525 Anim of running)[/center]
[center][size=14pt]Picture/videos[/size][/center]
[center][/center]
[center][/center]
[center][/center]
[center][/center]

[center][size=14pt]Credits
Delta
Chosen pk[/size][/center]

[center]
[size=14pt]
Warning[/size]
[size=12pt]I know people are not very happy on the delta base i dont mind Ideas being posted but no Flaming please you dont see me going to your thread and Flaming at you.! No bad comments dont like dont comment just leave the thread![/size][/center]

Read full topic
